name: mivisionx
description:
MIVisionX toolkit is a set of comprehensive computer vision and machine
intelligence libraries, utilities, and applications bundled into a
single toolkit.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: ffmpeg
dependencies.description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.

dependencies.name: opencv
dependencies.description:
OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer
vision and machine learning software library.

dependencies.name: rocm-opencl
dependencies.description: OpenCL: Open Computing Language on ROCclr

dependencies.name: rocm-cmake
dependencies.description:
ROCM cmake modules provides cmake modules for common build tasks needed
for the ROCM software stack

dependencies.name: miopen-opencl
dependencies.description: AMD's library for high performance machine learning primitives.

dependencies.name: miopengemm
dependencies.description: An OpenCL general matrix multiplication (GEMM) API and kernel generator

dependencies.name: openssl
dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.
